data: Hello! And welcome to Metacognition Artificial Intelligence!
This program is designed to help people who know nothing about AI
to learn and design their own AI from scratch with no programming
knowledge required (although it is a plus)!
If you ever have a question about how something works in this
app or in AI in general go to the tutorials list on the left
Click the 'Continue' button down below to start your first tutorial!
Don't worry, if you want to review this tutorial or previous sections of it
just click the 'Back' button or select this tutorial again at any time!
First off, what even is AI? What are we doing here? Artificial Intelligence
is a rapidly expanding field that not many people know how to get into.
